name: Nyandanoid
description:
Version 5:

  • Flipped the crank input for the CW orientation
  • Added a speed multiplier to the main menu
  • Speed now increases by 0.20 every 30 seconds
  • Added a damage indicator for the blocks with more than 1 health

Version 4:

  • Flipped the crank input when screen rotation is on to match the position of the crank with the vaus paddle
  • Changed the menu options for screen rotation to: ROTATE SYSTEM CCW/CW
  • Added an experimental "USE MOTION SENSOR" orientation, but since I don't have a real device yet I am not sure if the values I used are correct. If they aren't, and anyone with one and the SDK would like to assist me, I can send them a custom version that prints out debug info of the accelerometer

Version 3:

  • fixes the straight horizontal ball glitch
  • adds TATE mode (screen rotation)

Version 2:

  • fixed 2 crash conditions
  • made the AI/attract screen interactive, in that the buttons on the dpad will add powers
